title: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file using File->Export->Zip File option in WSWB (WebStorm Web Browser), the export process fails.
EB: The export process should successfully create a zip file containing all the files with unique names, even if they are located in different directories.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects.
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., "foo.txt").
3. From the main menu, select File->Export and choose the Zip File option to export.
4. Observe the export process and verify that it fails.
